944160.name: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir OST & Extras
944160.description:
Enjoy more of t&T: Gleipnir with this special package! Listen to the soundtrack by pins & guests as you work, read, or try to save the world, and read the original comic from which the game was born, in a handy pdf format! (available in English, French and German)

tiny & Tall: Gleipnir Part 1 OST
Artist: pins
Contributors: Detox, François Requet

  • 01 - The Myth (feat. Detox)
  • 02 - Loki and Fenrir
  • 03 - The Quest, part 1
  • 04 - The Quest, part 2
  • 05 - Down in the Forge
  • 06 - Of Books and Mice (feat. François Requet)
  • 07 - We're going on an Adventure
  • 08 - Leaving Home
  • 09 - Into the Forest
  • 10 - Pursuit
  • 11 - The Hunter that Haunts the Woods
  • 12 - Forest Rivers
  • 13 - Old and New Friends
  • 14 - Lost
  • 15 - An Evening at the Bear Tamer's
  • 16 - The Forest at Night
  • 17 - Out of the Woods
  • 18 - The Wetlands
  • 19 - Ancient Glory
  • 20 - The War of Old under the Earth
  • 21 - The Rebels
  • 22 - Lone Watchtower
  • 23 - Thorolf, Lord of the Biennale Hunt
  • 24 - The Feast
  • 25 - tiny & Tall's Theme (Bonus)
  • 26 - t&T Division (Bonus) (by Detox)

The Soundtrack will be available in the following Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\tiny & Tall: Gleipnir Part One[/i]
944160.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语
